scripts.dev: npm run prestart && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ignore ./src/data/temp src/app.js
scripts.resetdb: cd src/db/ && dropdb broker --if-exists && createdb broker && NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest
scripts.resetdb:seed: cd src/db/ && dropdb broker --if-exists && createdb broker && NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run
scripts.resetdb:test: cd src/db/ && dropdb test_broker --if-exists && createdb test_broker && NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run
scripts.resetdev: npm run resetdb && npm run dev
